Play:
The Three Generations of Kamakura Shoguns
(Kamakura sandaiki / 鎌倉三代記)

Written By: Chikamatsu Hanji (近松半二)

First Staged: 1770

Reference: Keene, Donald, Bunraku: The Art of the Japanese Puppet Theatre (Tokyo: Kodansha International, 1973); Kokuritsu Gekijō jōen shiryōshū, edited by Kokuritsu Gekijō Geinō Chōsashitsu, vol. 215, May 1983; Bunraku July 1991, May 1983 Performance Programs

– Click image to view.

Performances:

July 1974: The Three Generations of Kamakura Shoguns

July 1979: The Three Generations of Kamakura Shoguns

May 1983: The Three Generations of Kamakura Shoguns

July 1983: The Three Generations of Kamakura Shoguns

July 1991: The Three Generations of Kamakura Shoguns

July 2000: The Three Generations of Kamakura Shoguns

Characters:

Shinzaemon (Furugori Shinzaemon / 古郡新左衛門)

Rokuro (Tondano Rokurō / 富田六郎)

Tokimasa (Hōjō Tokimasa / 北條時政)

Page (Koshō / 小姓)

Tozaburo, in fact Takatsuna (Adachi Tōzaburo jitsuwa Sasaki Takatsuna / 安達藤三郎実は高綱 (藤三郎実は佐々木高綱))

Kagaribi (Tsuma Kagaribi / 妻篝火)

Yagoro (Dohi Yagorō / 土肥弥五郎)

Okuru (Nyōbō Okuru / 女房おくる)

Miuranosuke's mother (Miuranosuke haha / 三浦之助母)

Orachi (Nyōbō Orachi / 女房おらち)

Lady-in-waiting Sanuki (Sanuki no tsubone / 讃岐の局)

Lady-in-waiting Awa (Awa no tsubone / 阿波の局)

Tokihime (Hōjō Tokihime / 北條時姫)

Miuranosuke (Miuranosuke / 三浦之助)

Shigarami (Koshimoto Shigarami / 腰元柵)

Sakuragi (Koshimoto Sakuragi / 腰元桜木)

Shigure (Koshimoto Shigure / 腰元時雨)

Gemba (Iimori Genba / 飯盛玄番)

Yoshitoki (Hōjō Yoshitoki / 北條義時)
